txt.en: Many wild beasts stalk the ruins of Sarnúr, but these creatures have been enslaved or twisted to the will of Angmar through the cunning devices of the goblins, who breed and cruelly torment them. Many now act as spies and guards for the Dourhands and must be destroyed, lest they be unleashed into the lands of Ered Luin to wreak mischief and havoc upon its peoples.
Your battles against the enslaved beasts within the ruins of Sarnúr have strengthened you, though they weigh heavily upon your heart.
